ComicInfo.Title: Lar' Dog: Boy's Night Out #1398; Frida; Li'l Ray and the Gang; Tear it Up, Terry Downe; Boxer, Bikini, or Brief
ComicInfo.Summary:
Lar' Dog: Boy's Night Out #1398: Ray and Doyle meet up with Lar'Dog, a gruff friend of theirs with a large appetite for self-destruction.
Frida: Covering Frida's life from birth to her cremation using many, many art styles.
Li'l Ray and the Gang: Ray walks around the neighborhood wearing his brother's sweater in this Charles Schulz/Hank Ketcham mashup.
Tear it Up, Terry Downe: A kaleidoscopic portrait of Terry through the eyes of many people, each giving their own perspective on her, ranging from the time she first arrived to Hoppers as a runaway teen to her current time playing with the band 40 Thieves.
Boxer, Bikini, or Brief: Ray paints Maggie while she poses. The Danita arrives and takes her place.
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with the ninjas.walk.alone fork of ComicTagger 1.3.5 using info from Comic Vine on 2024-05-30 23:17:30. [CVDB95757] Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-10 21:59:46. [Issue ID 212414]
ComicInfo.Characters: Larry and Darleen's son,Darleen,Unnamed music video actress
